description: Conversion of dwellinghouse to form two self-contained flats (1x1 bed and 1x3 bed); alteration of roof from hip to gable end, rear roof extension; installation of two rooflights to the front roofslope and single storey rear extension (following elapsed consent ref: PP/2010/1047 dated 07/09/2010)
decision_conditions: It is considered the proposed dwelling does not provide acceptable quality of living as the proposed sizes of the units do not comply with the minimum space standards set out in Annex 4 of The London Plan Housing Supplementary Planning Guidance. As such the proposal is not considered to be in accordance with section 7 of the National Planning Policy Framework, Policy 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy, and policies 7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).
